= What Does This Error Mean - Rails Plugin

This plugin overrides the error message page that appears in rails' development mode when an exception is raised to provide a link to search whatdoesthiserrormean.com for that error.

= Installation

$ script/plugin install git://github.com/giraffesoft/what_does_this_error_mean-rails.git
